âŒ›ï¸ How To:

     ** Configure Extension **

         # Click icon to open "options" page
         # User can choose perferred language in drop-down menu
         # User can choose to turn "ON/OFF" the extension

     ** Explain Selected Text **:
 
         1) select any test on the webpage and a "Explain" button will showup next to the selected text;
         2) Click the button and AI will explain the text in a popup window.

      * Summarize Whole Page**:

         1) Right-click anywhere on the webpage.
         2) Click "Summarize Page" option on the menu and AI will summarize the content of the whole page for you.
